title: TaskMaster Pro
description: A modern task management app built with Jetpack Compose, featuring offline sync, dark mode, and Material You design.

title: WeatherWise
description: Clean architecture weather app with MVVM pattern, Room database, and beautiful animations using Lottie.

title: FitTracker
description: Fitness tracking app with Kotlin Coroutines, Firebase integration, and real-time workout monitoring.
